author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Computer Programs And Systems Says Entered Amendment To Existing Credit Agreement
text: 27 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Computer Programs And Systems Says Entered Amendment To Existing Credit Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 14 (Reuters) - Computer Programs And Systems Inc : * COMPUTER PROGRAMS AND SYSTEMS SAYS ON FEB 8, CO, UNITS, ENTERED THIRD AMENDMENT TO COâ€˜S EXISTING CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED JAN 8, 2016 - SEC FILING * COMPUTER PROGRAMS AND SYSTEMS SAYS AMENDMENT TO INCREASE AMOUNT OF REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY FROM $45 MILLION TO $50 MILLION * COMPUTER PROGRAMS AND SYSTEMS INC - AMENDMENT INCREASES AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF CREDIT FACILITIES FROM $162 MILLION TO $167 MILLION Source: ( bit.ly/2GaiLdq ) Further company coverage:
